<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tower Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 277 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 10 gp

**AC Bonus** 2 (+4<sup>2</sup>)

**Speed Penalty** -5 ft.
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 4

**Hardness** 5

**HP (BT)** 20 (10)
</row>

</column>

---

These massive shields can be used to provide cover to nearly the entire body. Due to their size, they are typically made of wood reinforced with metal.

 <sup>2</sup> Getting the higher bonus for a tower shield requires using the [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) action while the shield is raised.

<title level="2">Specific Magic Shields</title>
[Amaranthine Pavise](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1280), [Cursebreak Bulwark](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1260), [Rampart Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1283), [Sapling Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1860), [Warding Escutcheon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1863)
